https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qxLyRRKvQEqGdLxYYF5ytAnZ1WB.jpg When Jahnavi approaches Vishwanath, a con man, with an idea to humiliate three people, who wrecked her father's life, he joins hands with her without any second thoughts. The rest of the film is about how Vishwanath succeeds in his mission. Bandipotu
